name: STRIKER: COOLEST DUDE
description:
Created for Pancelor's Memory Jam.

---

You are STRIKER, the single coolest operator the world's ever seen and ever will see.  As another Ro-Bro with evil intentions sets foot in Atomos, you'll be the first to step up to the task and sacrifice your off-duty hours for a noble and heroic cause.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move, Aim

Click, Ctrl: Shoot

Space: Jump

Shift: Sprint

X: Strafe

---

Known bugs:

Soft Crash on Linux-- related to ending event code.  Still investigating.

Unclear vertical aim tutorial-- to be investigated and corrected in the HELP update.
